General.Name: Korean Air Lines Co Ltd
General.Description: Korean Air Lines Co., Ltd. provides airline services. The company operates through Air Transport, Aerospace, and Hotel and Others segments. It also offers passenger and cargo transportation service. In addition, the company engages in the maintenance of aircraft and manufacture of aircraft parts. Further, it offers hotel, accommodation, hotel management, airport support and engine repair, rental, sports and leisure, online sales, small aircraft transport service, as well as develops and supplies software. Additionally, the company offers cargo information network services and engages in labor related services. It operates a fleet of 157 aircraft connecting 13 domestic and 107 international destinations in 42 countries. Korean Air Lines Co., Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
